Feb 13, 2024

THERE WILL BE A SPECIAL MEETING OF THE CITY COUNCIL ON
TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 13, 2024, AT 8:30 AM AT THE CITY HALL
ANNEX, 344 BROADWAY, 2ND FLOOR, CAMBRIDGE, MA 02139 TO
DISCUSS GOAL SETTING FOR THE 2024-2025 COUNCIL TERM.

Feb 13, 2024
